qas.question: Why do some cops use bicycles to patrol?

answers.text: they allow for more open interaction with the public

qas.question: How do bicycles help catch some suspects?

answers.text: their quieter operation can facilitate approaching suspects unawares and can help in pursuing them attempting to escape on foot

qas.question: What do police use to control motorcyclist events?

plausible_answers.text: they allow for more open interaction with the public

qas.question: Why do all cops use bicycles to patrol?

plausible_answers.text: they allow for more open interaction with the public

qas.question: Why do some cops use motorcycles to patrol?

plausible_answers.text: their quieter operation can facilitate approaching suspects unawares and can help in pursuing them attempting to escape on foot

qas.question: How do bicycles help catch some police officers?

plausible_answers.text: their quieter operation can facilitate approaching suspects unawares and can help in pursuing them attempting to escape on foot

qas.question: How don't bicycles help catch some suspects?
What don't police use to control motorcyclist events?

context: <a2_0><b7_0>Motorcycles<b7_0/><a2_0/> are also commonly used, particularly in locations that a car may not be able to reach, to control potential public order situations involving meetings of motorcyclists and often in escort duties where motorcycle police officers can quickly clear a path for escorted vehicles. Bicycle patrols are used in some areas because <a0_0><b3_0><b4_0>they allow for more open interaction with the public<b4_0/><b3_0/><a0_0/>. In addition, <a1_0><b5_0><b6_0>their quieter operation can facilitate approaching suspects unawares and can help in pursuing them attempting to escape on foot<b6_0/><b5_0/><a1_0/>.
